testcase.name: should match the snapshot
should return true when function is called
Constructs Properly
should throw an authentication error if user has not logged into kubernetes with error 403
should throw an authentication error if user has not logged into kubernetes with error 401
should properly check if namespace exists in kubernetes cluster and find it
Should throw an error if the namespace defined does not exist in cluster
should throw an error if the current context is not found
should throw an error if the user was not found
should throw an error if namespace was not found through current context object name or namespace property
should create a uid associated with the kubeconfig email
should throw an error if KubeConfig was not able to be accessed from Kubernetes
should return secret if credentials exists in kubernetes
should throw an error when required credential fails to load
should not throw an error when optional credential fails to load
should save a kubernetes secret successfully if credentials are not found
should save a kubernetes secret successfully if credentials are found and deleted
should throw an error if a secret was not able to be stored
should delete a kubernetes secret successfully if the secret exists
should fail to delete a kubernetes secret if secret is not found and throw an error
